item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, April 3, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Overengineered Anchor Links (93 points | 44 comments)
2. Show HN: OpenNutrition – A free, public nutrition database (200 points | 85 comments)
3. InitWare, a portable systemd fork running on BSDs and Linux (59 points | 13 comments)

5. I maintain a 17 year old ThinkPad (451 points | 404 comments)

14. Type (YC W23) is hiring a senior software engineer ( | hide)

23. MIT 6.5950 Secure Hardware Design – An open-source course on hardware attacks (204 points | 12 comments)

25. Tell HN: Announcing tomhow as a public moderator (1722 points | 448 comments)
